definition: a type of standing harp, smaller than konghou 箜篌, with 5-25 strings

sentences.english: And he thought the Feast of Saint Catherine would be perfect.
sentences.chinese: 並且他認爲聖凱瑟琳節的盛宴將是最好的。

sentences.english: St. Catherine was named the patron saint of wheelwrights.
sentences.chinese: 聖凱瑟琳被指定爲輪子製造者的保護聖者。

sentences.english: St. Catherine is the main downtown shopping street.
sentences.chinese: 聖凱瑟琳是最主要的商業街。
